column4: anyone using Virtual Box ever had the problem of Virtual Box not detecting a single device??
anyone using Virtual Box ever had the problem of Virtual Box not detecting a single device??
hi
You may get an answer in #vbox
I know what VBox is thx...
I was just looking for the name of the channel
ah, that will be helpful. thx
ah, sry about that then
No worries
Which version of virtualbox are you using? Earlier versions wont read the current versions files
no, it's not files, I want to sync my iPod with iTunes in VB
Vbox has that whim of sometimes detecting it and sometimes refusing to detect it. I was wondering if there is any fix for that
Good luck with that. A friend of mine is trying to install itunes. Hang on while I see if she is online and I will ask her where she got with it
thx, I just have no idea why it would sometime connect and sometimes not... weird...
Me neither
I believe there is a native linux app that will work with the ipod. I wonder if itunes will work in wine.
My friend used itunes in vbox. I wasnt sure if she used wine. Have you googled for "wine iTunes "?
I'm using iTunes via VBox, it's working fine. iTunes via wine works, but it can't detect and sync with iPods
Ah OK. If you are not using the latest stable version of vbox it might pay you to upgrade but ask in #vbox to be sure. They know more about it - much more than I do.
I probably am, I used the version from the website.
everything is working fine. except VBox has this whim that I was hoping that someone knows and can fix
